text: @MichaelArt123 Everyone out her disclosing COVID-19 infex of WH staff, but you don’t hear a thing about STD infex of Trump and Melania. Where are the herpes, chlamydia, syphillis, etc. test results? I bet Trump has had the clap so many times, his med chart reads like a standing ovation.
